name: 米尔德丽德·戴维斯 Mildred Davis
intro: Mildred Davis was born on February 22, 1901 in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, USA as Mildred Hillary Davis. She was an actress, known for Safety Last! (1923), A Sailor-Made Man (1921) and Grandma's Boy (1922). She was married to Harold Lloyd. She died on August 18, 1969 in Santa Monica, California, USA.
birthplace: 美国,宾夕法尼亚州,费城
